com.gemalto.idp.mobile.oob

Interface OobManager


  • public interface OobManager
    A manager to serve the OOB manager objects.

    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OobMessageManager getOobMessageManager(String clientId, String providerId)
      Returns the OOB message manager
      OobNotificationManager getOobNotificationManager(String clientId)
      Returns the OOB notification profile manager, which can be used to add/remove/set the notification profile details of the user.
      OobRegistrationManager getOobRegistrationManager()
      Returns the OOB registration manager object.
      OobUnregistrationManager getOobUnregistrationManager(String clientId)
      Returns the OOB unregistration manager object.

    • Method Detail

      • getOobRegistrationManager

        OobRegistrationManager getOobRegistrationManager()
        Returns the OOB registration manager object.
        Returns:
        The OOB registration manager object.

      • getOobUnregistrationManager

        OobUnregistrationManager getOobUnregistrationManager(String clientId)
        Returns the OOB unregistration manager object.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The ID of the client to unregister.
        Returns:
        The OOB unregistration manager object.

      • getOobNotificationManager

        OobNotificationManager getOobNotificationManager(String clientId)
        Returns the OOB notification profile manager, which can be used to add/remove/set the notification profile details of the user.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The ID of the client who's profile will be managed.
        Returns:
        the OobNotificationManager object attached to the provided clientId.

      • getOobMessageManager

        OobMessageManager getOobMessageManager(String clientId,
                                       String providerId)
        Returns the OOB message manager
        Parameters:
        clientId - The ID of the client used for message communication.
        providerId - The ID of the provider used for message communication.
        Returns:
        the OobMessageManager object attached to the provided clientId.
